controls.name: control_custom_348029
controls.label: Submit Pitch
controls.customCode:
This process flow outlines the steps taken by True Altitude to market your deal to our network:

  • Receive completed On-boarding doc
  • Receive deal documents (i.e Investment Deck, IM, Teaser, Financial Model etc.)
  • Receive deal Executive Summary
  • Build out unique True Altitude microsite (including deal and sponsor pages)
  • Review and run Executive Summary through compliance
  • Internal and Sponsor sign off
  • Site/Deal publish

controls.name: control_custom_318525
controls.label: Note
controls.customCode: These fields are ongoing updates and will be captured throughout the program. These fields can be updated by accessing the 'My Pitches' page and editing your pitches.
